markdownRemark.html:
• Employer:

    • La Vida Tec Co., Ltd

  • Targeted Users:

    • Patients

  • User Scenarios:

    • Telemedicine becomes significant to the public under the COVID pandemic, and WaConsult provides telemedicine appointments for one-on-one video consultation services.
      When a patient make an appointment, a physician would receive the notification on WaPro app. After arranging, the physician would send the patient a text message including a chatroom link to start a consultation.

  • Programming Language:

    • TypeScript

  • Libraries:

    • axios
    • firebase
    • koa
    • next
    • next-i18next
    • next-seo
    • node-forge
    • react
    • react-dom
    • react-transition-group
    • redux
    • redux-persist
    • redux-persist-transform-encrypt
    • redux-saga
    • reselect
    • styled-components
    • styled-system
    • typescript

  • Featuresï¼š

    • Developed image uploading feature by implementing Firebase Storage
    • Implemented cryptographic algorithms such as ECC, RSA, and AES to secure sensitive data
    • Supported Responsive Web Design
  • Product Released on Jul 13, 2021

frontmatter.description: An web that allowed people to make a telemedicine appointment.
frontmatter.title: WaConsult: Telemedicine Appointment
